item.title: 交易日 美联储押注下滑，鲍威尔登场
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 新西兰恒天然集团将以 22 亿美元向 Lactalis 出售消费者业务
item.description: 新西兰恒天然合作社集团（Fonterra Co-operative Group）周五表示，将以38.45亿新西兰元（约合22.4亿美元）的价格向法国乳业巨头拉克塔利斯（Lactalis）出售其全球消费者及相关业务。【原文：New Zealand's Fonterra Co-operative Group will sell its global consumer and associated businesses to French dairy giant Lactalis for NZ$3.845 billion ($2.24 billion), the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 在利基小麦期货市场，重新启动的传统合约抵御了巨头对手的新产品
item.description: 在农产品期货市场的一个小角落里，一个已经交易了 140 多年的传统春小麦合约正在抵御全球最大的期货交易所芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group）今年春季推出的竞争合约的挑战。【原文：In a head-to-head contest in a small corner of agricultural futures markets, a legacy spring wheat contract that has traded for more than 140 years is fending off a challenge from a competing contract launched this spring by CME Group, the world's largest futures exchange.】

item.title: 人工智能工具需求强劲，Zoom Communications上调年度预测
item.description: 周四，中兴通讯（Zoom Communications）上调了年度营收和利润预期，这主要得益于混合型工作趋势以及人工智能技术与产品的融合，使其股价在延时交易中上涨了 4.5%。【原文：Zoom Communications raised its annual revenue and profit forecasts on Thursday, banking on hybrid work trends and the integration of artificial intelligence technology into its products, sending its shares up 4.5% in extended trading.】

item.title: Intuit 预测第一季度收入增长低于预期，股价下跌
item.description: Intuit 周四预测第一季度营收增长低于分析师预期，这表明其营销平台 Mailchimp 表现低迷，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌近 6%。【原文：Intuit forecast first-quarter revenue growth below analysts' estimates on Thursday, a sign of sluggish performance at its marketing platform Mailchimp, sending its shares down nearly 6% in extended trading.】

item.title: 萨斯喀彻温省省长将赴中国讨论油菜籽关税问题
item.description: 加拿大西部萨斯喀彻温省省长斯科特-莫伊（Scott Moe）周四表示，他将前往中国，就说服中国政府放弃对油菜籽征收新关税一事进行会谈。【原文：Scott Moe, premier of the western Canadian province of Saskatchewan, said on Thursday that he would travel to Chinasoon for talks on persuading Beijing to drop its new tariffs on canola.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，NBC 环球公司与美国职业棒球联盟（MLB）即将达成为期三年、金额接近 6 亿美元的协议
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，康卡斯特旗下的 NBC 环球公司正在与美国职业棒球大联盟（Major League Baseball）进行深入谈判，双方将在 NBC 和孔雀流媒体服务上转播比赛，协议为期三年，年收入接近 2 亿美元。【原文：Comcast-owned NBCUniversal is in advanced talks with Major League Baseball to carry games on NBC and the Peacock streaming service in a three-year deal approaching $200 million annually, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普签署行政命令，设立首席设计官职位
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四签署了一项行政命令，成立国家设计工作室，并设立首席设计官一职，以帮助改善联邦数字和实体服务的 "可用性和美观性"。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday signed an executive order to establish a National Design Studio and create the role of a chief design officer to help improve the "usability and aesthetics" of Federal digital and physical services.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Aspiration Partners 的联合创始人承认欺诈投资者
item.description: 美国司法部周四表示，由演员小罗伯特-唐尼（Robert Downey Jr.）和莱昂纳多-迪卡普里奥（Leonardo DiCaprio）支持的一家金融科技公司（原名为Aspiration Partners Inc）的联合创始人已承认在一项2.48亿美元的计划中欺诈投资者和贷款人。【原文：The co-founder of a fintech firm formerly known as Aspiration Partners Inc, and which was backed by actors Robert Downey Jr. and Leonardo DiCaprio, has pleaded guilty to defrauding investors and lenders in a $248 million scheme, the U.S. Justice Department said on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，特朗普正考虑将《CHIPS 法案》中的 20 亿美元资金用于关键矿产
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，特朗普政府正在考虑一项计划，从《CHIPS 法案》中重新分配至少 20 亿美元，用于资助关键矿产项目，并增强商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）对战略部门的影响力。【原文：The Trump administration is considering a plan to reallocate at least $2 billion from the CHIPS Act to fund critical minerals projects and boost Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick's influence over the strategic sector, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会任命玛格丽特-瑞安为执法处处长
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周四任命玛格丽特-瑞安（Margaret Ryan）为该机构执法部门主管。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday named Margaret Ryan as the director of the agency's enforcement division.】

item.title: 美国司法部将撤销以加密货币为后盾的资金转移案件
item.description: 美国司法部的一位官员周四表示，美国司法部不打算针对那些在没有犯罪意图的情况下创建用于传输加密货币的去中心化平台的软件开发商。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department does not plan to target software developers that create decentralized platforms for transmitting cryptocurrencies without criminal intent, a Justice official said on Thursday.】

item.title: 巴拿马穆里诺公司大规模裁员后将推动金吉达回归，并抨击诉讼威胁
item.description: 巴拿马总统何塞-劳尔-穆里诺周四抨击了有关可能对香蕉巨头金吉达公司提起诉讼的报道。【原文：Panama's President Jose Raul Mulino on Thursday blasted reports of a possible lawsuit against banana giant Chiquita, which fired all its local day workers due to a strike, as he prepares to negotiate the firm's return to the country next week.】

item.title: 鲍威尔在杰克逊霍尔走钢丝，投资者认为市场面临风险
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在抑制通胀和支持劳动力市场之间徘徊不定，投资者正准备迎接波动，8 月份交投清淡，准备放大他周五在杰克逊霍尔（Jackson Hole）演讲中的任何市场动向。【原文：Investors are bracing for volatility as Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell walks a fine line between curbing inflation and supporting the labor market, with thin August trading poised to magnify any market moves from his Jackson Hole speech on Friday.】

item.title: 美联储官员对 9 月降息态度冷淡，市场等待鲍威尔讲话
item.description: 周四，在投资者为美国央行行长杰罗姆-鲍威尔在怀俄明州杰克逊霍尔年会上的讲话做准备之际，三位美联储官员似乎对下月降息的想法态度冷淡。【原文：Three Federal Reserve officials appeared lukewarm on Thursday to the idea of an interest rate cut next month, as investors geared up for U.S. central bank chief Jerome Powell's speech to the annual Jackson Hole conference in Wyoming.】

item.title: 渥太华称加拿大卡尼与特朗普会谈并讨论了贸易问题
item.description: 卡尼办公室在一份声明中说，加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）周四与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）进行了会谈，双方就贸易挑战和其他问题进行了 "富有成效和广泛的对话"。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney spoke to U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday and had "a productive and wide-ranging conversation" on trade challenges and other issues, Carney's office said in a statement.】

item.title: 金德利将在三年内在印度投资 22.5 亿美元
item.description: 从 IBM 分离出来的信息技术服务提供商 Kyndryl 周四表示，未来三年将在印度投资 22.5 亿美元。【原文：Kyndryl , the information technology services provider that was spun out of IBM , said on Thursday it would invest $2.25 billion in India over the next three years.】

item.title: 强劲的首次公开募股引发对华尔街银行 IPO 谨慎定价的质疑
item.description: 最近在美国上市的公司首日涨幅巨大，这引发了人们的疑问：华尔街银行对美国全面关税带来的波动性和经济不确定性保持警惕，它们是否对这些公司的定价过于谨慎，从而使投资者受益，但却导致发行商错失良机。【原文：Big first-day gains by recent high-profile U.S. listings have raised questions over whether Wall Street banks — wary of volatility and economic uncertainty from sweeping U.S. tariffs — are pricing them too cautiously, benefiting investors but causing issuers to miss out.】

item.title: 美国劳工和权益组织敦促各州拒绝特斯拉向马斯克支付 290 亿美元的薪酬
item.description: 一个由美国工会和进步倡导团体组成的联盟敦促负责监督公共养老基金的州财务官员反对为特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）发放新的薪酬，并警告说过高的成本会给工人的退休储蓄带来风险。【原文：A coalition of U.S. labor unions and progressive advocacy groups urged state financial officers overseeing public pension funds to oppose fresh pay awards for Tesla CEO Elon Musk, warning the excessive cost poses risks to workers' retirement savings.】

item.title: 马斯克与 X 公司将就推特解雇事件达成 5 亿美元的和解协议
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和他的社交媒体公司 X Corp 达成了一项临时协议，以解决 Twitter 前员工提起的诉讼，这些员工称他们被拖欠了 5 亿美元的遣散费。【原文：Elon Musk and his social media company X Corp have reached a tentative agreement to settle a lawsuit filed by former Twitter employees who said they were owed $500 million in severance pay.】

item.title: 苹果将 TV+ 的订阅价格提高到 12.99 美元
item.description: 苹果公司将从周四起把流媒体服务 Apple TV+ 的价格上调 3 美元，康卡斯特旗下的 NBCUniversal 旗下的 Peacock 也采取了类似举措。【原文：Apple will raise the price of streaming service Apple TV+ by $3 starting Thursday, following a similar move by Comcast-owned NBCUniversal's Peacock.】

item.title: Glencore 目标未来十年在阿根廷生产 100 万吨铜
item.description: 矿业巨头嘉能可公司（Glencore）在阿根廷的首席执行官周四表示，该公司预计在未来 10 至 15 年内通过其在阿根廷的项目生产 100 万吨铜。【原文：Miner Glencore expects to produce 1 million tons of copper through its projects in Argentina over the next 10 to 15 years, the company's CEO in the Latin American country said on Thursday.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国司法部将调查美联储主席库克，敦促将其免职
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，美国司法部计划对美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）进行调查，一名高级官员已将调查情况告知美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell），并鼓励他将丽莎-库克免职。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department plans to investigate Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook, with a top official informing Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell of the probe and encouraging him to remove her from the board, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会主席警告科技公司不要为遵守欧盟和英国法律而削弱数据隐私权
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会主席周四警告 Alphabet、亚马逊、微软和其他科技公司，如果为遵守英国和欧洲数字内容法律而做出的努力削弱了对美国用户的隐私和数据安全保护，就可能违反美国法律。【原文：The chairman of the U.S. Federal Trade Commission warned Alphabet, Amazon, Microsoft and other technology companies on Thursday that efforts to comply with British and European digital content laws could violate U.S. law if they weaken privacy and data security protections for American users.】

item.title: 企业安全支出激增，Ontic 在 KKR 领投下融资 2.3 亿美元
item.description: 企业安全软件公司 Ontic 周五表示，该公司已在另类投资巨头 KKR 领投的一轮融资中筹集了 2.3 亿美元，以寻求向全球和政府部门扩张。【原文：Corporate security software firm Ontic has raised $230 million in a funding round led by alternate investment juggernaut KKR , it said on Friday, as it seeks to expand globally and into the government sector.】

item.title: Hazeltree 数据显示，对冲基金在 WH Smith 股价暴跌前将其列为头号空头
item.description: 对冲基金和投机者在 7 月份将 WH Smith 选为做空的首选目标，而在此之前，这家英国旅游零售商周四宣布了一项会计错误，导致其股价暴跌超过 45%。【原文：Hedge funds and speculators picked WH Smith as their top target for short selling in July, before the British travel retailer announced an accounting error on Thursday that sent its shares tumbling more than 45%.】

item.title: Gryphon 将以约 16 亿美元的价格向 Blackstone 出售 Shermco
item.description: 私人投资公司 Gryphon Investors 周四表示，已同意将其投资组合公司 Shermco 出售给 Blackstone，交易价值约为 16 亿美元。【原文：Private investment firm Gryphon Investors said on Thursday it had agreed to sell Shermco, its portfolio company, to Blackstone in a deal valued at about $1.6 billion.】

item.title: 贝莱德研究部门向投资者大肆宣传对冲基金
item.description: 贝莱德投资研究所（BlackRock Investment Institute）周四表示，该公司认为投资者应该增加对冲基金的投资。【原文：The BlackRock Investment Institute believes investors should bulk up their exposure to hedge funds, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国将就生物燃料豁免做出裁决，但大型炼油商可能需要等待
item.description: 据两位熟悉规划的消息人士透露，唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府预计最早将于本周五就小型炼油厂寻求美国生物燃料法减免的日益积压的申请作出裁决，但将推迟就大型炼油厂是否必须通过提高自身的生物燃料掺混量来补偿的问题作出决定。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration is expected to rule on a growing backlog of requests from small oil refiners seeking relief from U.S. biofuel laws as early as Friday, but will delay a decision on whether larger refiners must compensate by boosting their own biofuel blending, according to two sources familiar with the planning.】

item.title: 摩根大通聘请两位投资银行家加强对能源公司的服务
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份备忘录，摩根大通聘请了两名银行家来提高其针对能源公司的投资银行业务能力，其中一名银行家将帮助该银行专注于覆盖该行业的中间市场客户。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has hired two bankers to boost its investment banking capabilities for energy companies, including one which will help the bank focus on coverage of middle-market clients in the sector, per a memo seen by Reuters.】
